scripts.gi: bash bin/install; npm i; mkdir -p ./logs; npm run pip3; npm run bundler
scripts.shell: neo4j start; env $(cat .env bin/.keys-peppurr) NODE_ENV=development bin/hubot
scripts.deploy: if [ $npm_config_bot ]; then bot=$npm_config_bot; echo Bot is SET to: $bot; else bot=peppurr; echo Bot is DEFAULTED to $bot; fi; DEPLOY=.keys-$bot forever start --minUptime=1000 --spinSleepTime=1000 --killSignal=SIGTERM --uid $bot -m 10 -a -p ./logs -l $bot.log index.js
scripts.debug: if [ $npm_config_bot ]; then bot=$npm_config_bot; echo Bot is SET to: $bot; else bot=shadow; echo Bot is DEFAULTED to $bot; fi; DEPLOY=.keys-$bot forever --minUptime=1000 --spinSleepTime=1000 --killSignal=SIGTERM --uid $bot -m 10 -a index.js
scripts.pip3: sudo virtualenv pyenv; source pyenv/bin/activate; sudo pip3 install -r requirements.txt
